title: TSM vs Cloud9
body: What will happen at the finals?

replies.body:
While a slight ha escaped me reading this. I feel there is something missing...

Oh, the fact that TSM is losing.
Man ... TL went on a major tilt after that third game loss. It was quite sad actually, C9 Balls took it to them.
Well, TL appears to not be able to play a single threat comp (not many teams can). I still think putting Fenix on a carry and they would have swept C9 but that is neither here nor there.
Yeah, we see how they fair against TIP for 3rd place.
Last year was a fluke, time for C9 to show who the true kings of NA are.
Lol. Well, it's biased, but I like your poll.

The only thing I'm sure of in this series is that Cloud 9 wins Game 1. I believe TSM wins Game 5, but less confident in that prediction.

Why am I so sure TSM loses Game 1?

Since Lustboy joined, TSM has played 8 Best of 3 or Best of 5 series (starting with Season 4 Summer Split Playoffs). Yes, TSM is 6-2 in those series, which makes me think TSM will eventually get the series win. But their 6-2 record is even more impressive once you hear this upcoming stat.

Does anyone remember what TSM's record is in Game 1 of the past 8 series?
...
1-7
...
Yes, TSM won Game 1 just once during this current 6-2 run. Oh, and that lone Game 1 win? Against World Elite in the IEM Finals, when TSM was DOWN by about 7k gold until WE decided to dive mid inhib turret. 2 or 3 teamfights later, and TSM completes the comeback. So TSM could have lost all 8 Game 1s.

But yet, TSM won 6 of those 8 series, which makes me think TSM will win. They never feel out of it mentally, whether in a single game or a series itself. TSM just performs better when at a gold deficit than most other teams, able to hold the game close until the other team eventually screws up, gets over-confident, etc. Exhibit A: 1st game against CLG (the game that started CLG's Pink Age). Exhibit B: Keeping Liquid from winning the game for MUCH longer than it should have taken (and only losing because TSM themselves got over-confident and left the Rek'Sai backdoor wide open). Exhibit C: The aforementioned Game 1 vs WE.
A very likely prediction. TSM does not have a lot of luck in game 1.
TSM will probably lose 1st game then win 3 in a row. Classic you know.

TSM will win 3-1. 

In every game they win they'll start off poorly, giving up a couple kills and be at a gold deficit. Then they'll have one team fight they win that turns things around. 

The one game they'll lose they'll fuck something up after that team fight.
FreeSM and FreeLG should meet up and compare notes!
TSM win 3-1. TSM is just the better team now. C9 is just lucky that they got to face TL instead of CLG or TIP.

I'm failing to see how C9 going against CLG (FreeLG) would make any difference to the outcome. 

TL did sweep CLG. So you would think that C9 would have had an easier time of CLG than they did with TL. (Which they almost lost to, but we don't need to get into that).
